post.body: I know, I secretly wish I wasn't working the event and could just get a make-over and drink wine! Hehe
don't have the time to even think about it :) I'm all for bargains and coupons, but asking for additional is beyond my realm!
true! one call actually asked what my upcoming sales were going to be for Jan. & Valentine's Day!
@sarvasoap glad to hear it's happening to others too. Never had that happen over the holidays B4
Attempted my best "CS smile thru the phone" and suggested items to add and qualify for free ship- also put in a few free samples
had 3 phone calls like that yesterday- I'm already offering 20% off gift sets & free ship with qualifying orders.... come on!!!
happy for you and your good news!
already turned on the heat- I'm a cold wimp :) stay toasty!
I love those S&P mills! got some for our wedding, they make a great gift
good luck, hope some rest and relaxation is coming your way soon!
I know! I think hubs wanted me to "remove myself" only 3 days, so it may be a really good experience
sounds yummy! what's GM?
I lived in Tortola for a while and have been going there for the past 15 years. What type of place are you looking for?
enjoy! what a sweet way to spend a Sat.
a very large American black lab. Ironic, we were out seeing Marley and Me when he did it!
Haha- I know, just spoke with sis who's still shoveling! it's still chilly-water is 55, but I have a thick wetsuit. Merry xmas!
pretty excited for our 1st Santa Barbara xmas. Definitely a change from snowy Boston where we usually spend the holidays!
you too, enjoy!
green start-ups fare best with VCs in 2009 http://tinyurl.com/4zay4q
printing shipping labels, listening to xmas tunes on pandora, catching up on what's going on in the world
California officials launch 'Green Chemistry' initiative http://tinyurl.com/4qe7vd CA B&Bs must read- wonder if it will evolve to B&Bs too?
30 days of savings ends Sat. 12/20! 20% off grapeseed organic skin care made from the byproduct of wine http://tinyurl.com/53oh59
Excited for ladies beauty night at Oreana Winery tonight! It's gonna be a long day, with lots of coffee, ending in wine :) good stuff!
glad I filled some orders last night. Starting the rush to process and pack orders in time for pick-ups. No help coming in this AM.
going to process a few orders that came in this afternoon and work on new formulations again tomorrow. Need a real home cooked meal tonight!
long day testing out formulations for new products... one didn't go as planned, deciding if I should give it another go or call it a day
phew- just had good reminder that the simplicity of one-page checkout can still be a challenge for those not used to shopping online
added shipping options for next day and 2nd day with NO additional rush charges. Lots of calls this AM, it WILL arrive before xmas folks!
just found out there's no cell or internet service where we are heading on vacation next week. hmm, might be good,but challenging
cleaning out inbox and following up on multiple wholesale inquiries that came in during the holiday rush
working on inventory and year end stuff with hubs- psyched to have his help for 2 more weeks, and a little mini vacation next week!
going to ride my bike downtown and do a little shopping, gift cards to spend :) love being on vacation in my own town!
naughtiest xmas puppy antic? Our guy counter-surfed last night & ate 1/2 a pie. He's so tall, none of the counters are safe grounds anymore!
heading out to walk the pup to the coffee shop. That's enough work for me today :) Enjoy and go do something fun for you!
pkg just arrived. gave customer $ off next order and apology 4 delay due to act of God, have no control over weather or canceled flights
l1 shipment did not arrive by xmas. Nasty customer email...w/all the crazy weather, that puts us at about 99% delivered. Tracking now
good morning! feeling relaxed, content and looking forward to some hiking, surfing, shopping and more relaxing!
Wishing a wonderful Christmas Eve to all! I'm off to cook
morning! getting together recipes to start cooking for dinner tonight with friends. Hoping to get a surf in today before the rain starts!
wishing everyone joy, peace and relaxation. off to unwind , get in the holiday spirit & test new masks and soaks. Enjoy
